name: The Final Circle
description:
"The Final Circle" is a 2D Top Down Horror Game Made For "Scream Jam 2021" ,

It's about a boy lost in hell 

Credits : The Game is made by me  "Oussama Khazri" in "Unity 3D"

Additional Credits :

Player Sprite By Wulax

Monster Sprite By William.Thompsonj & Redshrike 

Olde English Font By Dieter Steffmann

Hellbound Font By Thomas W.Otto

More Art By Chris Hamons From Opengameart.com

Music By Moxie Music & N91Music
